sourcesContent:
import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import { useGetOrderDetailsQuery } from '../slices/orderSlice'; import React from 'react' const Order = () => { const { id: orderId } = useParams(); const { data: order, refetch, isLoading, error } = useGetOrderDetailsQuery(orderId); return isLoading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error.data.message} ) : ( <>

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {' '} {order.user.email}

Address: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}{' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelivered ? ( Delivered on {order.deliveredAt} ) : ( Not Delivered )}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? ( Order is empty ) : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} Pay ); } export default Order
